text:
:wave: This is still in beta! Did you find that article via search? It shouldn’t show up in search results yet because it’s not open to most portals yet.

<@U011FLHPT3N> and <@UCGBUH5TM> *please email me your portal IDs* and I will get you ungated for the multi-language blog beta! <mailto:svalsdottir@HubSpot.com|svalsdottir@HubSpot.com>

Hi Bayram! I’m not sure I follow — it sounds like you have two brand domains, each with their own language, right?
Technically, you can make a template multi-language, but it might be easier to have separate templates, especially if there’s any other variation (such as layout, logo, etc).
I’d be interested in learning more about your setup, and I could get more specific if we can look at an example. Could you send me an email so we can connect? <mailto:svalsdottir@HubSpot.com|svalsdottir@HubSpot.com>
